TopicTitle: Bug in the game chart ( Google translator )

Articles.Content:
I changed my computer yesterday and I went to play KSP that my new computer, it is powerful enough however the KSP is a bug (Glitch) in graphics / 3d models

I really need help, if you can help me I would be very grateful (Sorry for bad english, I used the google translator

Settings of my computer:

Processor: Intel Pentium E5800 Dual-Core @ 3.20GHz 3.20GHz

RAM: 4 GB (DDR3)

Video card: Raedon HD 4500 Series 512 MB

Operating System: Windows 8.1 Pro x64

Using DriverBooster all drivers are updated.

Here's the bug :

Edited August 16, 2015 by Golaky
OrionBra, we need your logs, or we cannot know what is going on, but please install the latest drivers for your graphics card and reboot your PC.
It was just reset , the problem has gone away
